chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 Pro has a problem:
The battery doesn't last long enough.
Thank you,

Hello ecomobile,    

The customer has changed his mind about his item and would like to return it for a refund.  

I am counting on you to deal with his request on receipt of the parcel.  

Best regards,    

Anthonio, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Ecomobile

The order is shown to have been delivered, we would like confirmation from you, the customer is expecting reimbursement of his order. 

Regards,
Ruth from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile 

Please take note is a refund by withdrawal period.

Do not send a new device! 

Regards,
Manuel from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this, thank you.

Regards,
YR

Hi ecomobile, 

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their refund by withdrawal period.

Please provide it, within the next (1) business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, according to the Back Market Quality Charter.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Sincerely, 
Manuel Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare

The device seems to be locked with a code. Please assist the customer in unlocking the device for us.

Regards,
JH
